title: Machine Learning Engineer, OS Intelligence
summary: Are you excited about the ways Machine Learning can make all Apple products more intelligent and personalized? Within the umbrella of Core OS Power & Performance, the Energy Technologies division focuses on solving key resource tradeoff and optimization problems to imbue the low layers of the operating system with Machine Learning-based intelligence.
description:
In this role, you will have the opportunity to:

-Innovate, conceptualize, and prototype novel intelligent experiences.
-Build scalable cloud-based and on-device infrastructure.
-Analyze and present key performance data for highly-visible OS features.
-Write elegant, performant code in Objective-C or Swift.
-Consult with and influence other teams to drive adoption of new APIs.
preferred_qualifications:
Familiarity with Python, Objective C, or Swift.
Familiarity with Deep Learning libraries like PyTorch and Tensorflow.
Experience building and leading Applied Machine Learning projects in industry or academia.
education_experience:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience.
Strong programming background and a clear understanding of operating system components.
Familiarity with statistics, data analysis, or machine learning.
pay_benefits:
At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range.
The base pay range for this role is between $143,100 and $264,200, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location.
Apple benefits include comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, tuition reimbursement, and more.
